content:
# EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Copper plate mine at position(x=41.0, y=-82.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner mining drill (position x=41.0, y=-82.0) and a stone furnace at position (x=41.0, y=-80.0)
- Burner inserter (position x=39.5, y=-79.5) and a burner inserter at position (x=41.5, y=-78.5)

### Copper cable factory
No entities found for this structure.

### Electricity generator at position(x=106.5, y=-32.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Offshore pump (position x=106.5, y=-32.5)
- Boiler (position x=111.5, y=-32.0)
- Steam engine (position x=117.5, y=-30.5)
- Pipe group (position x=107.5, y=-34.5) and a pipe group at position (x=105.5, y=-32.5)

### Transport system at position(x=40.5, y=-83.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Belt group (position x=40.5, y=-83.5)
- Transport belt (position x=63.5, y=-53.5) and a transport belt at position (x=64.5, y=-53.5)

# ERROR TIPS
### Errors when using burner entities
- Ensure that burner entities have fuel before using them.
- Make sure to provide the necessary ingredients for stone furnaces.

### Errors when using offshore pumps and boilers
- Ensure that offshore pumps and boilers are connected to the electricity network.

### Errors when using transport belts
- Ensure that transport belts are properly connected to form a working transport system.

### Errors when using inserter entities
- Ensure that inserter entities have a source of items to insert.

# NAMESPACE
No utility functions or variables have been defined or invoked in the provided execution logs.
